introduction: SYNOPSISHae-ji Young-suk and Se-min all grew up in the same orphanage. Hae-jin becomes a reporter after being raised by loving adoptive parents, Se-min enters the crime world as a result of suffering from the shock of his abandonment and Young-suk graduates with top honors from a prestigious university and takes care of disabled children who call him 'Ggok-Ji-Ddan'. Hae-ji finds Ggok-Ji-Ddan to do a story and finally meets her childhood friend Young-suk and also meets Se-min who has crashed the party to steal the jewelry there. When Young-suk's family 'the ant farm' is attacked by criminals, Soo-yeon is kidnapped. With the help of Se-min, Young-suk rescues Soo-yeon and enraged he takes their stash of drugs. Se-min advises him to turn the drugs over to the police as soon as possible but the men who are after the drugs kidnap Hae-ji after setting fire to the 'ant farm'. Young-suk risks his life to save her and agrees to trade the drugs for her. Se-min turns back from his trip to pull off one last job and leave to Haiti to help his friends in need.故事慧姬，Yeongseok和Seemin在同一个孤儿院长大 赫杰在寄养父母的热爱中长大，但是塞米却对母亲感到震惊，步入了罪恶的世界。他是高中毕业的学生，照顾乞丐和智障人士。慧姬涵盖了这个话题的性格，并在曲折的结尾遇见了他的老朋友永硕。然而，士绅与困难人民同居，巨人洞穴遭到恶棍的攻击。在Semin的帮助下救了Su-Yeon的Yeon-seok愤怒地被抓住了并且夺取了他们的毒品。Seemin很快将毒品交给警方，并建议他在安排完所有事情之后离开。在一个寻找毒品的组织中，他们对着滑稽动物燃烧并绑架他们。她爱她，并决心死亡，并通过一个电话去诺言的地方。Seemin终于想砸到Taiti了，但他转过身去，除了和兄弟结成深厚的友谊的Yeji和Yeongseok。
